   sphinx-quickstart on Tue Sep  5 12:43:37 2017.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to PyPCB's documentation!
=================================

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   
PyPCB implements an annotation GUI and access to deep learning models that can detect ICs, capacitors, resistors, and text. This project was created by the Face Aging Group at UNCW.


Indices and tables
==================

* :ref:`genindex`
* :ref:`modindex`
* :ref:`search`
